Cards.name: Channel Divinity: Divine Fortune
Cards.description: In the face of peril, you hold true to your faith and receive a special boon.

details.name: Effect
details.text: You gain a +1 bonus to your next attack roll or saving throw before the end of your next turn.

Cards.name: Channel Divinity: Turn Undead
Cards.description: You sear undead foes, push them back, and root them in place.

details.name: Hit
details.text: 1d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier. The target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Increase damage to 2d10 + Wisdom modifier at 5th level, 3d10 + Wisdom modifier at 11th level, 4d10 + Wisdom modifier at 15th level, 5d10 + Wisdom modifier at 21st

details.name: Miss
details.text: Half damage, and the target is not pushed or immobilized.

Cards.name: Healing Word
Cards.description: You whisper a brief prayer as divine light washes over your target, helping to mend its wounds.
Cards.frequencySpecial: You can use this power twice per encounter, but only once per round. At 16th level, you can use this power three times per encounter.

details.name: Effect
details.text: The target can spend a healing surge and regain an additional 1d6 hit points.
Increase the amount of additional hit points regained to 2d6 at 6th level, 3d6 at 11th level, 4d6 at 16th level, 5d6 at 21st level, and 6d6 at 26th level.

Cards.name: Lance of Faith
Cards.description: A brilliant ray of light sears your foe with golden radiance. Sparkles of light linger around the target, guiding your ally’s attack.

details.name: Hit
details.text: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and one ally you can see gains a +2 power bonus to his or her next attack roll against the target.
Increase damage to 2d8 + Wisdom modifier at 21st level.

Cards.name: Priest’s Shield
Cards.description: You smite your foe with your weapon and brand it with a ghostly, glowing symbol of your deity’s anger. By naming one of your allies when the symbol appears, you add divine power to that ally’s attacks against the branded foe.

details.name: Hit
details.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you and one adjacent ally gain a +1 power bonus to AC until the end of your next turn.
Increase damage to 2[W] + Strength modifier at 21st level.

Cards.name: Righteous Brand
Cards.description: You utter a minor defensive prayer as you attack with your weapon.

details.name: Hit
details.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and one ally within 5 squares of you gains a power bonus to melee attack rolls against the target equal to your Strength modifier until the end of your next turn.
Increase damage to 2[W] + Strength modifier at 21st level.

Cards.name: Sacred Flame Sacred Flame
Cards.description: Sacred light shines from above, searing a single enemy with its radiance while at the same time aiding an ally with its beneficent power.

details.name: Hit
details.text: 1d6 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and one ally you can see chooses either to gain temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier + one-half your level or to make a saving throw.
Increase damage to 2d6 + Wisdom modifier at 21st level.

Cards.name: Cause Fear
Cards.description: Your holy symbol ignites with the fury of your god. Uncontrollable terror grips your enemy, causing him to instantly recoil.

details.name: Hit
details.text: The target moves its speed + your Charisma modifier away from you. The fleeing target avoids unsafe squares and difficult terrain if it can. This movement provokes opportunity attacks.

Cards.name: Divine Glow
Cards.description: Murmuring a prayer to your deity, you invoke a blast of white radiance from your holy symbol. Foes burn in its stern light, but your allies are heartened and guided by it.

details.name: Hit
details.text: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.

details.name: Effect
details.text: Allies in the blast gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Cards.name: Healing Strike
Cards.description: Divine radiance gleams from your weapon. When you smite your enemy, your deity bestows a minor blessing in the form of healing for you or one of your allies.

details.name: Hit
details.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier radiant damage, and the target is marked until the end of your next turn. In addition, you or one ally within 5 squares of you can spend a healing surge.

Cards.name: Wrathful Thunder
Cards.description: Your arm is made strong by the power of your deity. When you strike, a terrible thunderclap smites your adversary and dazes him.

details.name: Hit
details.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier thunder damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Cards.name: Avenging Flame
Cards.description: You slam your weapon into your foe, who bursts into flame. Divine fire avenges each attack your enemy dares to make.

details.name: Hit
details.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).

details.name: Miss
details.text: Half damage, and no ongoing fire damage.

details.name: Special
details.text: If the target attacks on its turn, it can’t attempt a saving throw against the ongoing damage.

Cards.name: Beacon of Hope
Cards.description: A burst of divine energy harms your foes and heals your allies. The radiant energy lingers around your holy symbol and improves your healing powers for the rest of the battle.

details.name: Hit
details.text: The target is weakened until the end of its next turn.

details.name: Special
details.text: You and all your allies in the burst regain 5 hit points, and your healing powers restore +5 hit points until the end of the encounter.

Cards.name: Cascade of Light
Cards.description: A burst of divine radiance sears your foe.

details.name: Hit
details.text: 3d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and the target gains vulnerability 5 to all your attacks (save ends).

details.name: Special
details.text: Half damage, and the target gains no vulnerability.

Cards.name: Guardian of Faith
Cards.description: You conjure a ghostly guardian, indistinct except for a glowing shield emblazoned with your deity’s symbol. A burst of radiance erupts from it to sear foes that move next to it.

details.name: Hit
details.text: You conjure a guardian that occupies 1 square within range. Every round, you can move the guardian 3 squares as a move action. The guardian lasts until the end of the encounter. Any creature that ends its turn next to the conjured guardian is subject to a Wisdom vs. Fortitude attack. On a hit, the attack deals 1d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.

Cards.name: Bless
Cards.description: You utter a simple prayer and gain the power to instantly heal wounds, and your touch momentarily suffuses you or a wounded creature with a dim silver light.
Cards.target: You and each ally in burst

details.name: Effect
details.text: Until the end of the encounter, all targets gain a +1 power bonus to attack rolls.

Cards.name: Cure Light Wounds
Cards.description: You utter a simple prayer and gain the power to instantly heal wounds, and your touch momentarily suffuses you or a wounded creature with a dim silver light.

details.name: Effect
details.text: The target regains hit points as if it had spent a healing surge.

Cards.name: Divine Aid
Cards.description: You beseech your deity to grant you or one of your allies the strength to overcome a hindrance.

details.name: Effect
details.text: The target makes a saving throw with a bonus equal to your Charisma modifier.

Cards.name: Sanctuary
Cards.description: You cast a protective ward upon a creature that makes enemies’s attacks less effective.

details.name: Effect
details.text: The target receives a +5 bonus to all defenses. The effect lasts until the target attacks or until the end of your next turn.

Cards.name: Shield of Faith
Cards.description: A gleaming shield of divine energy appears over you, granting you and nearby allies protection against attacks.
Cards.target: You and each ally in burst

details.name: Effect
details.text: The targets gain a +2 power bonus to AC until the end of the encounter.
